creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: color image of a newspaper clipping with a photograph of two women looking out a window with marchers reflected in glass windowpanes on top of a book with a reproduction of a Monet painting of a woman wearing a pink dress, holding a cigarette, with a small glass in front of her
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Monet woman and café and modern version
